meanings.definition: To like (someone or something) better than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: I prefer chocolate ice cream over vanilla.
meanings.sent2: She prefers to read books rather than watch TV.
meanings.sent3: My cat seems to prefer sleeping on my laptop instead of her cozy bed.
meanings.sent4: He prefers to take the scenic route, even if it's longer.
meanings.sent5: The children prefer playing outside in the sunshine to staying indoors.

meanings.definition: To choose or want (someone or something) rather than someone or something else.
meanings.sent1: We prefer to go to the beach for our vacation.
meanings.sent2: They prefer apples over oranges for their snacks.
meanings.sent3: The dog prefers to sit on the couch instead of his own dog bed.
meanings.sent4: She prefers to take the stairs instead of the elevator for exercise.
meanings.sent5: I prefer to listen to music while I work to help me focus.
